SELECT ss.id, ss.vipname, count(ss.djl) co FROM ( SELECT d.id, d.time, v.vipname, d.djl, d.tablename FROM t_dianjiliang d, t_title t, t_vip v WHERE d.titleid = t.id AND d.vipid = v.id ) ss
YEARWEEK( date_format(ss.time, '%Y-%m-%d') ) = YEARWEEK(now())
AND ss.tablename = #{tablename}
GROUP BY ss.vipname order by count(ss.djl) desc
